title: PC_Constantine!-.direct.play.request.-ToeD
description:
The One Eyed Dude

provides you with

...:: Constantine! (SCi Games) -.direct.play.request.- ::...

:. ripped > nothing...

:. added > experience!...


about:

For all the latest news, hints and tips check out the Constantine
homepage at www-dot-constantinegame-dot-com

Windows XP, Windows ME, Windows 2000, Windows 98+98se
(Windows 95 and Windows NT are not supported)
1.5GHz or faster processor from Intel or AMD
128MB system RAM
2.5GB free hard disk space 
64MB Direct3D compatible video card 
(GFX Card must support Pixel Shading)
DirectX compatible sound card

.: install :.

1.: unrar with latest winrar or use 7zip!.
2.: double click: > SetReg.exe < ( must be done )
3.: double click: > MakeDesktopIcon.exe < and run game with it.


S p e c i a l   I n f o   N o t e :

Some virus-scanner recognize the header of a packed exe 

in this case its the "SetReg.exe" as a lame virus...

(coz its thebyte by byte check error of em!.) Its almost certainly 

a false positive alert from overly protective heuristics you can read

more about in your VirusTool-Manual or VirusTools-WebSite!.

(heuristics).    

>>>  thank you for reading!.


-ToeD
